short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables you to search your available Trello assets directly from within the Omnibar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Trello search in Chrome will make your life easier! 

Have you ever needed to find a trello card quickly and hate having to go to trello, then have to search?

If there was just a way to search for Trello cards just like I searched the web!

Well, now you can use your Chrome Omnibar to search your trello cards.

Simply enter 't' then space in your location bar to engage Trello search. This will allow you to initiate a Trello search directly from your location bar.

The team at McGaw.io is very grateful that you have downloaded our Trello Chrome extension.
